page.title: 17MARSH FARM
page.content: MARSH FARM. MARSH FARM IS BUILT UPON LAND RECLAIMED FROM THE SEA. IT IS SITUATED AT THE SOUTHERN END OF SOUTH WOODHAM FERRERS IMMEDIATELY OPPOSITE HULLBRIDGE. IT IS OPEN TO VISITORS AND MANY SCHOOLS IN ESSEX HAVE VISITED TO SEE A WORKING FARM WHICH IS UNDER THE CONTROL OF ESSEX COUNTY COUNCIL. IT HAS AN ANIMAL UNIT WHERE CHILDREN ARE ABLE TO SEE YOUNG CALVES , LAMBS AND PIGLETS BEING BORN AND REARED. THERE ARE 4 MAIN AREAS OF STUDY: SHEEP PIGS CATTLE NATURE ZONE THE LAST CAN BE SPLIT INTO 2, THE WILDLIFE RESERVE AND THE GRAZING ARABLE FARMING LAND.
